import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './style-eH.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import ExportExcel from 'react-export-excel'; const ExcelFile = ExportExcel.ExcelFile; const ExcelSheet = ExportExcel.ExcelSheet; const ExcelColumn = ExportExcel.ExcelColumn; /* import { DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, } from "reactstrap"; */ export function ElementosHome() { const [elementos, setElementos] = useState([]); const getElementos = async () => { await axios .get('http://localhost:5610/api/v1/elementos') .then(res => setElementos(res.data.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }; useEffect(() => { getElementos(); }, []); return (
Descargar Excel } filename="elementos" >
